00027 #define ZGP_CHANNELREQ_PAYLOAD_LEN           1
00028

00030 #define ZGP_CHANNEL_CONFIG_UNIDIR_MASK       0x10
00031 #define ZGP_CHREQ_NXT_CHANNEL_DELAY          2000
00032 #define ZGP_CHANNEL_CONFIG_WAIT_DELAY        50

00040                         Types section.

00042 /* Channel Req confirmation */
00043 BEGIN_PACK
00044 typedef struct _ZGP_ChannelReqConf_t
00045 {
00046   ZGP_Status_t status;
00047 }ZGP_ChannelReqConf_t;
00048 END_PACK
00049 
00050 /* channel Request parameters */
00051 BEGIN_PACK
00052 typedef struct _ZGP_ChannelReq_t
00053 {
00054   ZGP_Service_t service;
00055   uint8_t firstRxChannel;
00056   uint8_t secondRxChannel;
00057   void (*ZGP_ChannelReqConf)(ZGP_ChannelReqConf_t *conf);
00058   ZGP_ChannelReqConf_t confirm;
00059 }ZGP_ChannelReq_t;
00060 END_PACK
00061 typedef enum _zgpChannelConfigState_t
00062 {
00063   sChannelConfigIdle = 0,
00064   sChannelReqTx,
00065   sChannelReqTxDone,
00066   sChannelConfigWaiting,
00067   sChannelConfigDone
00068 }zgpChannelConfigState_t;
00069 /******************************************************************************
00070                         Prototypes section.
00071 ******************************************************************************/
00072 /******************************************************************************
00073   \brief    Handles the channel request and config procedure. Two Channel requests
00074             are sent in each channel, device opens rxWindow in every second request 
00075             and waits for channel config. Once the operating channel is fixed, 
00076             commissioning shall happen.
00077   \param    none.
00078   \return   none.
00079 ******************************************************************************/
00080 void zgpChannelReqHandler(void);
00081 /******************************************************************************
00082   \brief    This will initiate the channel request command
00083   \param    firstRxChannel - Gpd will open rxWindow in this channel after one or more 
00084                              channel requests
00085   \param    secondRxChannel - Gpd will open rxWindow in this channel after firstRxChannel
00086                              between the two rxWindows, there can be channel requests
00087   \param    ZGP_ChannelReqConf - commissioning confirmation callback
00088   \param    confirm - confirmation status
00089   \return   ZGP_Status_t.
00090 ******************************************************************************/
00091 ZGP_Status_t ZGP_ChannelReq(ZGP_ChannelReq_t *zgpChannelReq);
00092 /******************************************************************************
00093   \brief    handles received channel config command
00094   \param    none.
00095   \return   none.
00096 ******************************************************************************/
00097 void zgpChannelConfigInd(ZGP_DataInd_t *zgpChannelConfigInd);
